Sentece: Pharmacokinetics at a high repetitive dose (16 mg/kg) shows a biexponential plasma decay with T1/2 alpha of 8.33 +/- 2.47 min and T1/2 beta 2.8 +/- 0.7 hr.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of high-dose i.v. alizapride in prevention of cisplatin-induced emesis.
Name: Alizapride

Sentece: The pharmacokinetics of the drug are as follows: absorption begins about 30 minutes after the administration per os, its biodisponibility is about 60%, its clearance: 20 ml/minute and its elimination half life about 3 hours.
